refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gtk-builder-convert converts glade files into XML files which can be loaded with GtkBuilder.
It expects the name of a glade file as sole argument, and writes its output to stdout.

refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: GtkComboBox items are not converted into GtkListStore data.
GtkTextView text is not converted into a GtkTextBuffer.
The script requires a python interpreter to run.
